file_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0 and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure that the etcd data directory permissions are set to 700 or more restrictive
Ensure that the etcd data directory ownership is set to etcd:etcd
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/controller-manager.conf exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/controller-manager.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/pki/ exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure that the Kubernetes PKI certificate file permissions are set to 644 or more restrictive
Ensure that the Kubernetes PKI key file permissions are set to 600 or more restrictive

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and does not match pattern ^.*--token-auth-file=.*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--authorization-mode=Node,RBAC$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--admission-control-config-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--enable-admission-plugins=.+EventRateLimit.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--enable-admission-plugins=.+AlwaysPullImages.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and does not match pattern ^.*--disable-admission-plugins=NamespaceLifecycle.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and does not match pattern ^.*--insecure-bind-address.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--insecure-port=0$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--audit-log-path=\/var\/log\/apiserver\/audit\.log$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--audit-log-maxage=30$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--audit-log-maxbackup=10$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--audit-log-maxsize=100$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--request-timeout=300s$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--service-account-key-file.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--tls-private-key-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--tls-cert-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--etcd-cafile=.+$

Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_R
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--terminated-pod-gc-threshold=10$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--profiling=false$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--use-service-account-credentials=true$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--service-account-private-key-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--root-ca-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--key-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--cert-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--client-cert-auth=true$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--auto-tls=false$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--trusted-ca-file=.+$

file_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and has permissions rwxr-xr-x and does not have permissions ----w--w-
Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/kubelet.conf exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/kubelet.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /var/lib/kubelet/config.yaml exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/kubelet.conf exists and is owned by 0:0

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and does not match pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--hostname-override.+$
Ensure no file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--event-qps=0.+$

Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*--tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS

process58_test.comment: Ensure that the --basic-auth-file argument is not set
Ensure that the --token-auth-file parameter is not set
Ensure that the --kubelet-https argument is set to true
Ensure that the --kubelet-https argument is set to true or does not exist
Ensure that the --kubelet-client-certificate path is set as appropriate
